backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profile storage with permission checks for viewing, saving, and premium status upgrades or downgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs for learning mode improvements and chapter-context handling.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file mapping frontend paths to concise descriptions of their functionality across the app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that configures TanStack Router routes, query client, theming, and global layout.
frontend/src/components/chapters/Chapter: Renders a subject section with chapter cards linking to detailed chapter pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App-wide layout providing navigation, content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/learning-modes/L: Displays a learning mode icon using coordinates from a sprite sheet based on modeId.
frontend/src/components/learning-modes/r: Loads activity config for a modeId and renders the appropriate interactive learning mode component or an error alert.
Interactive fill‑in‑the‑blank quiz with hints, correctness feedback, scoring, and navigation between questions.
Flashcard viewer allowing users to flip cards, navigate between them, and reset the current card state.
Matching activity where users pair terms with definitions, track progress, and reset matches.
Expandable notes viewer where users check off bullet points and track overall completion progress.
Practice problem interface letting users type solutions, reveal step‑by‑step answers, and move through multiple problems.
Multiple‑choice quiz with scoring, answer validation, explanations, and step‑through question navigation.
React timer-based challenge mode that cycles through questions, tracks time, answers, and progress, and manages start/pause/reset states.
True/false quiz component that shows statements, records answers, displays correctness with explanations, and tracks score across questions.
frontend/src/components/nav/PrimaryNav.t: Primary navigation bar with desktop and mobile layouts, highlighting active routes and offering links to main app sections.
frontend/src/components/settings/Premium: Premium subscription card handling login, upgrade flow, loading states, and displaying premium benefits or prompts.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Settings section renderer that displays toggles, selects, and sliders based on setting definitions and updates values via callbacks.
frontend/src/data/learningModeActivities: Defines activity configurations for learning modes with sample content generators for flashcards, quizzes, MCQs, fill-in-the-blanks, matching, and more.
frontend/src/data/learningModes.ts: Defines the LearningMode interface and a list of learning mode options with ids, names, and descriptions.
frontend/src/data/ncertClass10Chapters.t: Defines subject and chapter structures and provides NCERT Class 10 subjects with their chapter lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks for fetching and updating user profiles and premium status using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles, CSS variables for themes, and utility layers including dark mode and high-contrast settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ChapterDetailPage.tsx: Renders chapter details, breadcrumbs, and learning mode options based on selected subject and chapter.
frontend/src/pages/ChaptersPage.tsx: Renders tabs for Class 10 subjects and displays chapter lists per subject using ChapterList.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the home hero banner and quick-access cards linking to chapters, learning modes, and settings.
frontend/src/pages/LearningModeRunPage.t: Loads and validates a learning mode and optional chapter context, showing mode details and rendering activities.
frontend/src/pages/LearningModesPage.tsx: Lists all learning modes with icons and links to start each mode.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Displays settings categories and controls, using useSettings to read and update user preferences.
frontend/src/settings/applySettings.ts: Applies visual and behavioral settings to the document root by toggling classes and CSS variables.
frontend/src/settings/settingsSchema.ts: Defines the schema for all settings categories, their fields, types, defaults, and options.
frontend/src/settings/useSettings.ts: Manages loading, saving, applying, and updating settings via React state and localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, extended color tokens, custom animations, fonts, and layout settings, and enables typography, container-queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for a Class 10 NCERT learning app, listing features, issues, and metadata for versioned build planning.
